content.raw: can you try also setting `ROS_IP` using `ENV` instead of export (also for `IS_GAZEBO`)? If that doesn't work, you can use the IP address of your machine for ros ip and the ros master env variable. For local testing, you can also add `--net=host` arg to the `docker run` command for the container to access the host network interface
